name: PetGPT
description: PetGPT is a UI clone of ChatGPT, inspired by CatGPT.

name: Inertia
description: Inertia is inspired by Momentum, a Chrome extension that replaces the new tab page with a customizable dashboard featuring to-do lists, weather, and more.

name: Chat-Task-Tic overlay
description: A task list overlay for coworking and study streamers, allows users to submit tasks from Twitch chat.

name: Streamodoro
description: A pomodoro timer for coworking and study streamers, allows streamers to set the time for work time and break time

name: Chess bot
description: A chess bot that takes over your mouse and plays chess for you
